rationale: The segment contains an intensifier ('really') modifying an adjective ('high') which modifies a noun ('alert'), not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: “The industry is definitely on really high alert,” said veterinarian Denise Heard with the U.S. Poultry & Egg Association trade group.

rationale: The segment quotes 'definitely on really high alert', which uses an intensifier ('really high') with the critical alert phrase 'on high alert'.
statement_text: “The industry is definitely on really high alert,” said veterinarian Denise Heard with the U.S. Poultry & Egg Association trade group.
